item.title: Fr33Scap3 Pk and Server Questions
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

[quote=“fr33sc4p3”][quote author=legendzpker link=topic=99555.msg1020153#msg1020153 date=1174087321]
add this beside your commands

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
npcId = newNPC;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“No such P-NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #”);
}
}

and add this where u think it goes

}else if (command.startsWith("pnpc")) {
			try {
				int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
				if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
					npcId = newNPC;
					isNpc = true;
					updateRequired = true;
					appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
			}
		}

[/quote]
l2usecodetags[/quote]

actually i would have if my reply button worked some times it does some times it dont it comes up 404 bad request

Read full topic
